testcase.classname: US019 Admin; yeni Staff (Personel) Oluşturma / Güncelleme / Görüntüleme ve Silme
testcase.name: US019TC01 Admin, SSN kimligine gore kayitli bir Staff(Personel) secebilir, arayabilir
testcase.system-out: Given Admin medunna_Url sayfasina gider.....................................passed When Admin medunna anasayfasinda sag_ust kosedeki kullanici ikonuna tiklar..passed And Admin kullanici ikonu altinda yer alan Sign_In butonuna tiklar..........passed And Admin user name "Team65" alanini doldurur...............................passed And Admin user password "Team65." alanini doldurur..........................passed And Admin Sign_In butonuna tiklar...........................................passed And Admin acilan anasayfada Items&Titles alanina tiklar.....................passed And Admin Items&Titles dropdown menusunde yer alan Staff secenegine tiklar..passed And Admin Create_A_Staff butonuna tiklar....................................passed Then Admin Use Search box'a tik atar........................................passed And Admin SSN box'una var olan bir staff'a ait "111-22-3333" girer..........passed And Admin Search_User butonuna tiklar.......................................passed Then Admin User found with search SSN mesajini gorur........................passed And Admin browser'i kapatir.................................................passed
